normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices - Ouch!**

unnormalised: Hey guys, kharcha pani is about to take another hit! News coming in hot that your beloved cooking gas cylinder just got pricier. Seems like those yummy dosas and parathas are costing us more now.
normalised: Hey guys, kharcha pani is about to take another hit! News coming in hot that your beloved cooking gas cylinder just got pricier. Seems like those yummy dosas and parathas are costing us more now.

unnormalised: Industry sources whisper (and by whisper, I mean loudly announce) that prices jumped again on 15th October. Expect to shell out around Rs. 50 more per cylinder, depending on where you live. That's like, one less movie ticket at PVR, ya know?
normalised: Industry sources whisper (and by whisper, I mean loudly announce) that prices jumped again on fifteenth October. Expect to shell out around rupee fifty more per cylinder, depending on where you live. That's like, one less movie ticket at P V R, ya know?

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, an economist from IIM Ahmedabad, says global energy markets are to blame. Apparently, demand is up, supply is tighter than my jeans after Diwali sweets, and everything is getting expensive.
normalised: Doctor Sharma, an economist from I I M Ahmedabad, says global energy markets are to blame. Apparently, demand is up, supply is tighter than my jeans after Diwali sweets, and everything is getting expensive.

unnormalised: This affects everyone, from auntyji making chai in her 500 sq ft flat in Mumbai to the dhaba wala in Delhi serving hungry customers.
normalised: This affects everyone, from auntyji making chai in her five hundred square feet flat in Mumbai to the dhaba wala in Delhi serving hungry customers.

unnormalised: Experts recommend checking with your local Indane or Bharat Gas dealer for the exact prices in your area. Kuch toh control karna padega! Maybe more dal and less paneer for a while? Let's see how long this lasts!
normalised: Experts recommend checking with your local Indane or Bharat Gas dealer for the exact prices in your area. Kuch toh control karna padega! Maybe more dal and less paneer for a while? Let's see how long this lasts!
